name: fraqtiv-git-rules
description: Git branching & PR policy enforcement + workflow suggestions (MCP server)

entry.notes: Uses current working directory as repo unless GIT_RULES_REPO_PATH set

GIT_RULES_REPO_PATH.description: Path to target git repo (default: CWD)

GIT_RULES_AUTO_HOOK.description: Set to 1 to auto-install pre-push hook
